Reviews.Title: Pretty Kool
Reviews.Author: Kool music
Reviews.Content: Okay,I was a little on the fence on buyingthis phone. But once I got it and had time to play with it .It turned out to be a pretty good phone. Feels good in the handsCamera is good . Data speed ok .it says its 4G on the lock screenGood for the price range. I love it! And I'm a phone Geek.

Reviews.Title: Best phone I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Shawn David Jacobson
Reviews.Content: I am used to android, but I was very pleased. This item was also listed as refurbished, but came to me looking brand new. Delivery took a little longer than I would have liked, but it was well worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: awesome little phone
Reviews.Author: Randy A. Feagans "Randy Feagans"
Reviews.Content: This is to me a generic version of the HTC 8x. Only thicker and without the colored case back. But in performance, screen size, camera, and overall looks (except thickness) this is virtually identical to the HTC 8x. Bought this for my wife. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone in a pinch because my other phone broke.  It is surprisingly good and is Windows 8, not 7.5/7.8  Similar in specs to the Lumia 625Reliable and just works; it does everything I need it to do.  Good quality phone calls and good quality pics.  Tho if you are looking for a hardware powerhouse this is not the phone for you (could use more RAM and Storage)

Reviews.Title: Don't buy until they fix the storage issue
Reviews.Author: lkh51981
Reviews.Content: I have only one complaint with this phone, but its a big one. It has been giving me a message almost since day one that the internal storage is full. At first it was just an annoyance, but it has reached the point where I can do nothing on the phone without deleting something. I can rarely ever take videos or pictures, I even had to delete 3 apps just to send a text this morning. Adding an SD card will do nothing. Even with everything stored on the SD card that can be (basically only pictures and music) and only a couple of basic apps installed it has only one Kb of free space. After extensive Googling it seems this is because of how the phone allocates any "free" space to its built in apps, which can't be uninstalled. From the number of complaints I have found the manufacturer must be aware of this, but as yet there is no fix. Until there is this phone is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: No service
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get service anywere other than that decent phone. If I could get service I would have kept it for myself

Reviews.Title: not happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Was not able to activate phone. Not on straight talk network. Was not happy with my purchase. Will keep for back up.

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows Phone 8 OS
3G/WiFi connectivity
4" touchscreen
microSD card slot supports up to 32GB (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Straight Talk Huawei H883G W1
